languages.text: {n}Прикосновение дознавателя — теплое и очень живое. Прижав вас к себе, он едва слышно выдыхает:{/n} "Я буду твоей решимостью. Твоей смелостью. Твоей непреклонностью. Я буду всем, чего тебе будет недоставать в этот темный час".
{n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."
languages.original_text: {n}Прикосновение дознавателя — теплое и очень живое. Прижав вас к себе, он едва слышно выдыхает:{/n} "Я буду твоей решимостью. Твоей смелостью. Твоей непреклонностью. Я буду всем, чего тебе будет недоставать в этот темный час".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator's touch is comforting and warm. He presses you against himself and breathes:{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything that you need in this dark hour."

{n}The Interrogator's touch is comforting and warm. He presses you against himself and breathes:{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything that you need in this dark hour."
{n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."
{n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."
{n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."

languages.text: {n}海因里希的手充满暖意，他将你紧紧抱在怀里。{/n}“我将成为你的决心，你的勇气，你的意志。在这黑暗的时刻，我会成为你需要的一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的手充满暖意，他将你紧紧抱在怀里。{/n}“我将成为你的决心，你的勇气，你的意志。在这黑暗的时刻，我会成为你需要的一切。”

languages.text: {n}Las manos de Heinrix son cálidas y apasionadas. Te abraza y susurra:{/n} «Seré tu determinación. Tu coraje. Tu resolución. Seré todo lo que necesites en este momento oscuro».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las manos de Heinrix son cálidas y apasionadas. Te abraza y susurra:{/n} «Seré tu determinación. Tu coraje. Tu resolución. Seré todo lo que necesites en este momento oscuro».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの手はあたたかく情熱的だった。あなたを抱き寄せ、そのまま呼吸を繰り返す。{/n}「我が御身の決断、勇気、そして決意になりましょう。この暗黒の時に必要とされるのなら、何にだってなりますよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの手はあたたかく情熱的だった。あなたを抱き寄せ、そのまま呼吸を繰り返す。{/n}「我が御身の決断、勇気、そして決意になりましょう。この暗黒の時に必要とされるのなら、何にだってなりますよ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Berührung ist warm und leidenschaftlich. Er drückt dich an sich und haucht: {/n}"Ich werde Eure Entschlossenheit sein. Euer Mut. Euer Wille. Ich werde in dieser dunklen Stunde alles sein, was Ihr braucht."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Berührung ist warm und leidenschaftlich. Er drückt dich an sich und haucht: {/n}"Ich werde Eure Entschlossenheit sein. Euer Mut. Euer Wille. Ich werde in dieser dunklen Stunde alles sein, was Ihr braucht."

languages.text: {n}Le contact d'Heinrix est chaleureux et passionné. Il vous serre contre lui et murmure dans un souffle :{/n} « Je serai votre détermination. Votre courage. Votre ferveur. Je serai tout ce dont vous avez besoin en cette heure fatidique. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le contact d'Heinrix est chaleureux et passionné. Il vous serre contre lui et murmure dans un souffle :{/n} « Je serai votre détermination. Votre courage. Votre ferveur. Je serai tout ce dont vous avez besoin en cette heure fatidique. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in dokunuşu, sıcak ve şevkli. Seni kendine yaklaştırıp kenetliyor ve derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Ben senin kararlılığın olacağım. Cesaretin olacağım. Azmin olacağım. Bu karanlık anda ihtiyaç duyduğun her şey olacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's touch is warm and ardent. He clasps you to him and breathes,{/n} "I will be your determination. Your courage. Your resolve. I will be everything you need in this dark hour."
